name: 2D Brick Breaker
description: Brick breaker is a breakout clone in which the player must smash a wall of bricks by deflecting the bouncing ball with a paddle. The paddle moves using keyboard keys. The player gets 3 lives to start with. A life is lost if the ball hits the bottom of the screen. When all the bricks have been destroyed, you get an ending scene. If all lives are lost, the game is over.
